From WSJ
“U.S. of­fi­cials said that FBI in­ves­ti­ga­tions into al­le­ga­tions of eco­nomic es­pi­onage and in­flu­ence op­er­a­tions of­ten led back to the Hous­ton con­sulate. The FBI has for years mon­i­tored peo­ple be­lieved to be in­tel­li-gence of­fi­cers op­er­at­ing from Chi­na’s Hous­ton con­sulate, for­mer agents said.”
